sections.heading: way; hunting upon; unlawful; penalty
sections.text: It shall be unlawful for anyone to hunt upon the fenced right-of-way of any railroad in Nebraska without permission of the owner or responsible authority. Any person who violates this section shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1959, c. 337, ยง 3

74-609.01.Right-of-way; hunting upon; unlawful; penalty.

It shall be unlawful for anyone to hunt upon the fenced right-of-way of any railroad in Nebraska without permission of the owner or responsible authority. Any person who violates this section shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1959, c. 337, ยง 3, p. 1220;Laws 1977, LB 39, ยง 187;Laws 1994, LB 414, ยง 20.
